PHRASE.LANG: These studly shoes will make it hard for some to avoid staring. You have been warned. [#Legal]
Ces chaussures viriles attireront tous les regards. Vous voilà prévenu. [#Legal]
Diese aufreißerischen Schuhe werden viele Blicke auf sich ziehen. Ich habe dich gewarnt. [#Legal]
Queste scarpe da macho catturano inevitabilmente gli sguardi. Uomo avvisato... [#Legal]
Estos impresionantes zapatos harán difícil evitar ser el centro de las miradas. Avisado quedas. [#Legal]
이 남자다운 신을 신으면 사람들이 계속 쳐다볼지도 모릅니다. 분명히 경고했습니다. [#Legal]
These studly shoes will make it hard for some to avoid staring. You have been warned.[#Legal]
我們預先警告您，這對具陽剛味的鞋一定會吸引別人的目光。[#Legal]
